product_name: Metolius Multi-loop Double D-Contour Gear Sling
long_description: The ergonomic Metolius Multi-Loop Double D-Contour gear sling allows for easy gear organization during technical rock climbs. Padded shoulder strap eases fatigue; adjustable girth hitch keeps your rack from sifting or swinging free. Reversible design changes easily from left to right shoulders; fully adjustable for comfort and versatility. Double D design has two sides for easy belay changeovers and switching from shoulder to shoulder. Multiple loops allow you to organize gear and prevent it from sliding. When a single-sided sling is desired, just stow one side in your pack.
short_description: The ergonomic Metolius Multi-Loop Double D-Contour gear sling allows for easy gear organization during technical rock climbs.
